title: Plan Weekly Production Schedule
description: A production planner needs to create the manufacturing schedule for the upcoming week based on demand forecasts and material availability.

tasks.description: Review the demand forecast for all products for the next month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the forecast and identifies which products have the most urgent demand.

tasks.description: Check the inventory of the required raw materials and API for the high-demand products.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that all necessary materials are in stock and released.

tasks.description: Create a production schedule that prioritizes the high-demand products and optimizes equipment utilization.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a schedule that sequences batches to minimize changeover times.

tasks.description: Publish the final schedule and create the electronic work orders for the scheduled batches.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent publishes the schedule and the corresponding work orders are created in the MES.
